articles.title: Jordan Peterson tears up over Don't Worry Darling villain inspiration - Insider
articles.description: During an appearance on "Piers Morgan Uncensored," Peterson responded to director Olivia Wilde's claim that Chris Pine's character was based on him.
articles.content: On Wednesday controversial Canadian psychologist Jordan Peterson appeared on "Piers Morgan Uncensored" to respond to director Olivia Wilde's claim that the villain in "Don't Worry Darling" was based … [+2575 chars]
